```pddl
[
  (:action create
    :parameters (?creator - agent ?entity - object)
    :precondition (and (not (created ?entity)))
    :effect (created ?entity)
  ),
  
  (:action create_small_studio
    :parameters (?p - agent ?st - object)
    :precondition (and (not (studio_set_up ?st)))
    :effect (studio_set_up ?st)
  ),
  
  (:action create
    :parameters (?creator - agent ?entity - object)
    :precondition (and (not (created ?entity)))
    :effect (created ?entity)
  ),
  
  (:action diffuse
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?entity - object ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and (prepared ?actor) (ready ?resource) (not (diffused ?entity)))
    :effect (diffused ?entity)
  ),
  
  (:action start_task
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?task - object ?resources - (set object))
    :precondition (and (all_resources_ready ?resources))
    :effect (task_started ?agent ?task)
  ),
  
  (:action have
    :parameters (?entity - agent ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (not (ready ?item)))
    :effect (ready ?item)
  ),
  
  (:action closeup
    :parameters (?entity - agent ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (not (ready ?item)))
    :effect (ready ?item)
  )
]
```
